name: Third Party Payment System
description: The Third Party Payment System (TPPS) is a register of paper checks that are known as Third Party Drafts.  These drafts are issued to vendors for goods and services, to SSA employees for reimbursement of payments and to beneficiaries for Programmatic Immediate Payments (IPs) and Emergency Advance Payments (EAPs).  TPPS enforces payment limits, maintains office draft stock, records and validates accounting data, and generates daily activity and monthly accountability reports.
